autoInsertSpaceInButton.description: When there are two Chinese characters in the button, a space is automatically added to the two Chinese characters.
autoInsertSpaceInButton.description_zh: 当按钮中是两个汉字时，自动在两个汉字中添加一个空格。

effectGlobalNotice.description: Whether to set the configuration of all Messages and Notifications globally. If you use the hook setting of useMessage, set it to false
effectGlobalNotice.description_zh: 是否全局设置所有 Message 和 Notification 的配置。如果用了 useMessage 的 hook 局部设置请设置为 false

rtl.description: The representation of the view starts from right and ends left.
rtl.description_zh: 视图的表现形式是从右开始向左结束。

size.description: Configuring the default size of a component takes effect only for components that support the size attribute.
size.description_zh: 配置组件的默认尺寸，只会对支持size属性的组件生效。

:loadingElement.description: A global loading icon that applies to all components.
:loadingElement.description_zh: 全局的加载中图标，作用于所有组件。

:componentConfig.description: Default parameters for configuring all components globally
:componentConfig.description_zh: 用于全局配置所有组件的默认参数

:focusLock.default: { modal: { autoFocus: true }, drawer: { autoFocus: true }}
:focusLock.type: {modal?: boolean | { autoFocus?: boolean };drawer?: boolean | { autoFocus?: boolean };}
:focusLock.description: The focusLock of the global configuration pop-up box is applied to the Modal Drawer component.
:focusLock.description_zh: 全局配置弹出框的 focusLock，作用于 Modal Drawer 组件。

:getPopupContainer.description: The parent node mounted in the global pop-up box.
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 全局弹出框挂载的父级节点。

:renderEmpty.description: Empty components within a global configuration component.
:renderEmpty.description_zh: 全局配置组件内的空组件。
